item.title: Eeyore add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "I just got out of the hospital. I was in a speed reading accident. I hit a book mark and flew across the room." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I do have one slightly crooked wheel upstairs, but everything else is ticking along just four-o, thank you very much." -- Stephen King

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "It's strange how pain marks our faces, and makes us look like family." -- Stephen King

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Life isn't a support system for art. It's the other way around." -- Stephen King

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "When I want you to beg, I'll tell you." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "Welcome to the wonderful world of jealousy, he thought. For the price of admission, you get a splitting headache, a nearly irresistable urge to commit murder, and an inferiority complex. Yippee." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Henry Winkler
item.description: "Assumptions are the termites of relationships." -- Henry Winkler

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Cecelia Ahern
item.description: "what a luxury it was for people to hold their loved ones whenever they wanted" -- Cecelia Ahern

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Love is too precious to be ashamed of." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Rachel Cohn
item.description: "It's bullshit to think of friendship and romance as being different. They're not. They're just variations of the same love. Variations of the same desire to be close." -- Rachel Cohn

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Stephanie Laurens
item.description: "Just because I'm not forever by your side doesn't mean that's not precisely where I want to be." -- Stephanie Laurens

item.title: Eeyore add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My Best Friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read." -- Abraham Lincoln
